vartool-config.antBuildxml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project name="common" basedir="." default="compile">
<!-- <property file="build.properties" /> --> <!-- // 직접 설정.--> <property name="project.dir" value="{{sourcePath}}" /> <property name="src.dir" value="${project.dir}/src/main/java" /> <property name="webcontent.dir" value="${project.dir}/src/main/webapp" /> <property name="lib.dir" value="${webcontent.dir}/WEB-INF/lib" /> <property name="resource.dir" value="${project.dir}/src/main/resources" />
<property name="default.dependency.dir" value="{{defaultDependencyPath}}" /> <property name="dependency.dir" value="{{dependencyPath}}" /> <property name="build.classes.dir" value="{{buildPath}}" /> <property name="deploy.dir" value="{{deployPath}}" /> <property name="deploy.classes.dir" value="${deploy.dir}/WEB-INF/classes" />
<path id="classpath"> <fileset dir="${lib.dir}" includes="*.jar" /> <fileset dir="${default.dependency.dir}" includes="*.jar" /> <fileset dir="${dependency.dir}" includes="*.jar" /> <fileset dir="${build.classes.dir}" includes="**/*.class" /> </path>
<target name="clean" description="Clean output directories"> <delete dir="${build.classes.dir}" /> </target>
<target name="compile" description="Compile main source tree java files"> <mkdir dir="${build.classes.dir}" /> <javac destdir="${build.classes.dir}" debug="true" optimize="true" deprecation="false" failonerror="true" encoding="UTF-8" classpathref="classpath" includeantruntime="true" verbose="true"> <src path="${src.dir}" /> </javac>
<echo message="build classes dir : ${build.classes.dir}"/>
<!-- class 와 자원들 배포. --> <copy todir="${deploy.classes.dir}" verbose="true"> <fileset dir="${build.classes.dir}" includes="**/*.class" /> <fileset dir="${src.dir}" includes="**/*.*" excludes="**/*.java,**/*.dev,**/*.test,**/*.prod" /> </copy>
<!-- resource 에 자원이 있는 경우. 주석 풀고 설정할것. <copy todir="${deploy.classes.dir}" verbose="true"> <fileset dir="${resource.dir}" includes="**/*.*" excludes="**/config/ep_config.properties,**/*.dev,**/*.test,**/*.prod"/> </copy> -->
<!-- web.xml 배포 하지 않고 서버에 맞는 걸로 배포. --> <copy todir="${deploy.dir}" verbose="true"> <fileset dir="${webcontent.dir}" includes="**/*.*" excludes="**/License/*.xml,**/*.jar,**/*.dev,**/*.test,**/*.prod" />
<!-- was weblogic 일때 처리 xml 관련 jar가 올라가면 에러남.그래서 필터.--> <fileset dir="${webcontent.dir}" includes="**/*.jar" excludes="**/xerces.jar,**/xercesImpl.jar,**/xml-apis-*.jar" /> </copy>
<!-- properties 배포. --> <copy todir="${deploy.classes.dir}" verbose="true" overwrite="true"> <mappedresources> <fileset dir="${src.dir}"> <include name="**/*.properties.dev"/> </fileset> <globmapper from="*.properties.dev" to="*.properties"/> </mappedresources> </copy>
<!-- xml 배포 --> <copy todir="${deploy.classes.dir}" verbose="true" overwrite="true"> <mappedresources> <fileset dir="${src.dir}"> <include name="**/*.xml.dev"/> </fileset> <globmapper from="*.xml.dev" to="*.xml"/> </mappedresources> </copy> </target> </project>
vartool-config.antWebBuildxml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project name="common" basedir="." default="deploy">
<!-- <property file="build.properties" /> --> <!-- // 직접 설정.--> <property name="project.dir" value="{{sourcePath}}" /> <property name="deploy.dir" value="{{deployPath}}" />
<target name="deploy" description="web resource deploy"> <mkdir dir="${deploy.dir}" />
<copy todir="${deploy.dir}" verbose="true"> <fileset dir="${project.dir}" includes="**/*.*" excludes="**/.settings/**,**/.git/**,**/.project"/> </copy>
<chmod perm="755" parallel="true"> <fileset dir="{{deployPath}}" includes="*.*">
</fileset> </chmod>
<exec executable="chmod" dir="${deploy.dir}" failonerror="true"> <arg line="-R 0755 ./wsrv"/> </exec>
</target> </project>
